page.title: 16Clifton Junction industry(3)
page.content: {Magnesium Elektron Ltd.,}or M.E.L. for short, covers an area of over 40 acres as well as an area for dumping {magnesium}waste. M.E.L. manufactures{alloys, {chemicals}and{engineering products.}It has factories in other parts of {England}and in{America.}Their products are sold all over the world and are used in the{aircraft, electronics}and {nuclear}industries. In addition M.E.L. products can be found in{paints, {printing inks, textiles, plastics, {adhesives}and{anti-perspirants. M.E.L. have a{sports}and social club. Here employees can play {football, tennis}and lots of other sports. They can also go for a drink and be{entertained}in the social club after work.
